TopicTitle: How I design military vehicles in KSP

Articles.Content:
This video pretty much sums it up. It is not historically accurate.

[video=youtube;pyakI9GeYRs]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pyakI9GeYRs[/video]
I've been looking for that film for years!

[quote name='andrew123']It is not historically accurate.[/QUOTE]
What do you mean? That movie was based on an officer's real life experience with the procurement process in the US military (though it was a bit dramatized).

[quote name='Red Iron Crown']What do you mean? That movie was based on an officer's real life experience with the procurement process in the US military (though it was a bit dramatized).[/QUOTE]

I should rephrase it: it has certain "exaggerations." The actual testing wasn't [I]that[/I] twisted.
Ah yes, The Pentagon Wars... Pretty good movie.
